title: Fan Coupon
subtitle: Convert visitors into fans of your Facebook page by rewarding them with an exclusive coupon or invitation to a special event.
bells_whistles: Upload a custom image and text to entice visitors and a second image that only fans of your Page will see. The app's flexibility allows you to change the promotion and images in seconds.

features.title: Get More Fans
features.description: Our fan gate feature entices new viewers to "Like" your Page before they can interact with your apps. This can explosively drive up your fan count, giving you a larger audience to engage with in the future.

features.title: Share Management
features.description: Every North Social app includes the ability to customize the image and messaging that gets posted to a user's wall when they share your Page.

features.title: Traffic Control
features.description: Control where your fans go next by linking them to other Facebook tabs or any URL on the web.
